title: Four UNC-Chapel Hill Employees Out In Wake Of Cheating Scandal
teaser: Lourdes Garcia-Navarro talks with Dan Kane of the Raleigh News and Observer about the faculty firings at UNC-Chapel Hill following a massive cheating scandal involving athletes taking fake courses and passing in order to maintain eligibility.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
